sentences.en: Acid and Basic Resistance, porosity permeability of the pot without water seepage.
sentences.cn: 耐酸碱, 锅体气孔透气且不渗水.

sentences.en: An amendent should decrease bulk density, increase toltal porosity , and incr ease water and air content.
sentences.cn: 改良剂能降低容重, 增加总孔隙度, 增加水和空气的含量.

sentences.en: An amendment should decrease bulk density, increase total porosity, and increase water and air content.
sentences.cn: 改良剂能降低堆积密度, 增加总孔隙度, 增加水和空气的含量.

sentences.en: Commonly the dolomite crytals form a framework with evenly distributed porosity.
sentences.cn: 通常白云石晶体构成格架,它有均匀分布的孔隙.

sentences.en: Metallic foams are new engineering marerials with high porosity.
sentences.cn: 金属泡津材料是一种高孔隙率的新的工程材料.

sentences.en: Oolite lime sand packs naturally with 40 % porosity because the particles are essentially spheroids.
sentences.cn: 自然堆积的灰质鲕粒砂具有40%的孔隙度,因为其颗粒其本上都是球状的.

sentences.en: Porosity : The condition of hair that makes it absorb moisture easily.
sentences.cn: 多孔性: 头发易于吸潮的情况.

sentences.en: Predrilling reservoir quality prediction includes porosity prediction and permeability prediction.
sentences.cn: 储层质量钻前预测包括储层孔隙度预测和渗透率预测.

sentences.en: Resistance to flow may be high enough to cause microvoids and porosity.
sentences.cn: 流动阻力可能太高,从而导致微孔和多孔.

sentences.en: Shallow burial seems to preserve chalky textured porosity.
sentences.cn: 浅埋藏似能保留具白垩状结构的孔隙.

sentences.en: Swelling and porosity of the propellant mixture became evident after 6 days at ambient temperature.
sentences.cn: 在室温下将药柱放置6天后,推进剂呈现膨胀和气孔.

sentences.en: The relation between air permeability andair permeability and porosity are discussed.
sentences.cn: 首先分析了织物紧度、孔隙率与透气性的相互关系.

sentences.en: The relation between the chlorinity and porosity may be approximated by a hyperbola.
sentences.cn: 含氯量和孔隙度之间的关系图式也许近似于一条双曲线.

sentences.en: The residual porosity indicates the compaction state of the formations.
sentences.cn: 而剩余孔隙度又反映了地层的压实状态.

sentences.en: The thermal conductivity of CMS ceramics also decreased with increasing porosity.
sentences.cn: CMS的导热系数随着气孔率的增加而降低.

words.tran_cn: 海绵动物的；有孔的，多孔的
多孔渗水的；能渗透的；有气孔的

trans.tran_en: Porosity is the quality of being porous
